attributes.action: create financial independence for England, Scotland Wales and Norther Ireland.  Whereby only the money raised in each region is expended on the national and local government, roads, hospitals, schools, police and armed forces.  Thereby creating a fair and just system and enabling each region to have national pride and responsibility.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is completely unfair for the people of one region of the country to finacialy support another to the extent that parts of the country are subsidised and offer better facilities and services such as seperate government, education and healthcare at the expense of those not enjoying the same.
